findings.title: MNT-7:Missing Zero Address Check in Staking::initialize
findings.description: The initialize function lacks a zero address check for the withdrawalWallet, which can lead to potential issues if called with a zero address.

findings.title: MNT-2:Incorrect calculation of totalControlled()
findings.description: The function `totalControlled()` is used to calculate the total amount of ETH controlled by the protocol, but it has an incorrect calculation.
